id.comment: Finds all statements that use 'iter' directly or indirectly

query.querystr: stmt s; Select s such that Uses(s, "iter")
procedure p; Select p such that Uses(p, "iter")

id.comment: Finds all print statements that use 'iter'

query.querystr: print pn; Select pn such that Uses(pn, "iter")

id.comment: Finds all while loops that use 'iter' in their condition or body

query.querystr: while w; Select w such that Uses(w, "iter")

id.comment: Finds all if statements that use 'iter' in their condition or branches

query.querystr: if ifs; Select ifs such that Uses(ifs, "iter")

id.comment: Finds all call statements where the called procedure uses 'iter'

query.querystr: call c; Select c such that Uses(c, "iter")

id.comment: Finds all call statements where the called procedure uses 'iter'

query.querystr: call c; Select c such that Uses(c, " iter")

id.comment: Finds all call statements where the called procedure uses 'iter'

query.querystr: call c; Select c such that Uses(c, " iter ")

id.comment: Finds all call statements where the called procedure uses 'iter'

query.querystr: call c; Select c such that Uses(c, "iter ")
